ivardefs.name: applicability_
ivardefs.desc: Expressions that describe applicability criteria for the billing code.

ivardefs.name: approvalDate
ivardefs.desc: The date on which the resource content was approved by the publisher. Approval happens once when the content is officially approved for usage.

ivardefs.name: code
ivardefs.desc: The defined billing details in this resource pertain to the given billing code.

ivardefs.name: contact_
ivardefs.desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

ivardefs.name: copyright
ivardefs.desc: A copyright statement relating to the charge item definition and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the charge item definition.

ivardefs.name: date
ivardefs.desc: The date  (and optionally time) when the charge item definition was published. The date must change when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the charge i

ivardefs.name: derivedFromUri_
ivardefs.desc: The URL pointing to an externally-defined charge item definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this definition.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: A free text natural language description of the charge item definition from a consumer's perspective.

ivardefs.name: effectivePeriod
ivardefs.desc: The period during which the charge item definition content was or is planned to be in active use.

ivardefs.name: experimental
ivardefs.desc: A Boolean value to indicate that this charge item definition is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing) and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: A formal identifier that is used to identify this charge item definition when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

ivardefs.name: instance_
ivardefs.desc: The defined billing details in this resource pertain to the given product instance(s).

ivardefs.name: jurisdiction_
ivardefs.desc: A legal or geographic region in which the charge item definition is intended to be used.

ivardefs.name: lastReviewDate
ivardefs.desc: The date on which the resource content was last reviewed. Review happens periodically after approval but does not change the original approval date.

ivardefs.name: partOf_
ivardefs.desc: A larger definition of which this particular definition is a component or step.

ivardefs.name: propertyGroup_
ivardefs.desc: Group of properties which are applicable under the same conditions. If no applicability rules are established for the group, then all properties always apply.

ivardefs.name: publisher
ivardefs.desc: The name of the organization or individual that published the charge item definition.

ivardefs.name: replaces_
ivardefs.desc: As new versions of a protocol or guideline are defined, allows identification of what versions are replaced by a new instance.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The current state of the ChargeItemDefinition.

ivardefs.name: title
ivardefs.desc: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the charge item definition.

ivardefs.name: url
ivardefs.desc: An absolute URI that is used to identify this charge item definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance; also called its canonical identifier. This SHOULD be globally unique and SHOULD be a literal address at which at w

ivardefs.name: useContext_
ivardefs.desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These contexts may be general categories (gender, age, ...) or may be references to specific programs (insurance plans, studies, ...) and may be used to assist w

ivardefs.name: version
ivardefs.desc: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the charge item definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the charge item definition author and is not expected to be globa

properties.desc: The ChargeItemDefinition resource provides the properties that apply to the (billing) codes necessary to calculate costs and prices. The properties may differ largely depending on type and realm, therefore this resource gives only a rough structure and re
